LedgerFlow

Improving the developer and user experience when building with Ledger hardware wallets through clear signing, hardware integration, and documentation improvements.

Explore Our Work View on GitHub

Project Overview

LedgerFlow addresses key challenges in the Ledger ecosystem across three strategic tracks

Clear Signing

ERC-7730 registry improvements with ERC-1155 support

Hardware Integration

Multi-chain explorer support for Ledger Stax and Flex

Documentation

Developer experience improvements and issue identification

Our Contributions

Detailed breakdown of our work across three key areas

Track 1 – Clear Signing (ERC-7730)

ERC-1155 Call Data Support to Registry

Key Features

  • Added ERC-1155 call-data structures for standard functions
  • Extended import functionality for ERC-1155 implementations
  • Implemented validation layer for imported call data
  • Introduced new registration methods for contract variants

Benefits

Standardized Integration

Provides unified support for all ERC-1155 implementations

Backward Compatible

No breaking changes to existing functionality

View Pull Request #1360

Track 2 – Hardware Integration

Multi-Chain Explorer Support for Ledger Stax and Flex

Improvements Made

  • Multi-Chain Explorer Support for Arbitrum, Base, Optimism
  • Dynamic Explorer Links with chain ID mapping
  • Updated UI messaging for generic explorer scanning

User Experience

Enhanced Transaction Verification

QR codes now redirect to the correct network-specific explorer, allowing seamless transaction verification across different chains.

View Pull Request #835

Track 3 – Documentation Improvement

Developer Experience Feedback and Issue Identification

Logo Inconsistency

Songbird network displays inconsistent logos across different device types and icon sizes.

Testing Issues

Identified limitations in ragger testing framework including screen advancement speed and navigation testing.

Registry Constraints

Documented signed registry limitations that prevent local modifications and testing.

Project Impact

Our contributions enhance the Ledger ecosystem for developers and users

For Developers

  • Standardized ERC-1155 integration patterns
  • Improved testing and debugging capabilities
  • Better documentation and issue visibility

For Users

  • Enhanced transaction transparency
  • Seamless multi-chain experience
  • Consistent visual identity across devices
